name: ViViD
description:
I can see it now… and everything is

ViViD is a short, mind-bending platformer that follows the plight of Burt; a troubled man who participates in a program asking him to test an experimental vision drug.

  • Nate Wiesel (@NateWiesel): design, programming, art, audio
